definition: as early as possible
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
early/morning/Good morning!/long ago/prematurely

sentences.english: What other types of things should co-founders be discussing in the early days of a startup and getting clarity on?
sentences.chinese: 还有哪些事情是创业公司应当尽早考虑的？

sentences.english: We also urge opposition parties to present their manifestoes to voters as early as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们还敦促在野党尽早发布他们对选民的政治宣言。

sentences.english: The soil pollution in this area is very serious, we should deal with it as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区的土壤污染非常严重，我们应尽早治理。

sentences.english: If you get bingo on the way, tell me in plenty of time.
sentences.chinese: 如果路上车快没油了，要尽早告诉我。

sentences.english: Please inform us of your travel plan at the earliest date so that we can make arangements.
sentences.chinese: 请尽早告知我们您的旅游计划，以便我们做出安排。

sentences.english: Please make up your mind / make your decision as early as possible / you can, or you’ll miss the good / golden chance / opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 请尽早做出决定，不然你会坐失良机。

sentences.english: So I want to see my great motherland to achieve peaceful reunification as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我愿意看到我们的伟大祖国能够尽早实现和平统一。

sentences.english: Dark lines beneath the nail should be investigated as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 科学家应该尽早对指甲之下的暗线进行调查。

sentences.english: You should go to see the doctor as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 你应该尽早看医生，别让它发展成一个严重的疾病。

sentences.english: It would be much appreciated if you could send me the reply as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果贵司能尽早的寄给我，我将十分感激。
尽早的发现和更正问题。

sentences.english: Please advise your travel plan at earliest date so we make argot acidly.
sentences.chinese: 请尽早告知旅游计划，以便我们做出安排。

sentences.english: A decision could come as soon as this week.
sentences.chinese: 必须在这周尽早地作出决定。

sentences.english: It was recommended that the annual maximum value method is worth to accept by the design code.
sentences.chinese: 建议《室外排水设计规范》尽早改用年最大值法选样。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ascertaining diagnosis and doing surgical operations as soon as possible is the key to cure trau…
sentences.chinese: 结论应该尽早明确诊断和手术是治愈本病的关键。

sentences.english: You early reply will be highly appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 你方若能尽早答复我方将非常感激。

definition: at the earliest possible time/as soon as possible
as quickly as possible/as soon as possible/with all speed
see 儘快|尽快[jin3 kuai4]
soon/shortly/on a day quite soon/promptly
ahead of schedule/sooner than planned/to bring forward (to an earlier time)
breakfast
to snatch time/to rush/to hurry (up)/to seize the moment
as far as possible/to do one's utmost
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
so that/so as to/in order to
top priority job/matter of vital importance
to adopt measures/to take steps
in time/promptly/without delay/timely
must/to need to/to be sure to
see 防患未然[fang2 huan4 wei4 ran2]
eager to/in a hurry to
in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
